docstring.long_description:
Note that these settings will not affect the trace returned by
EXTRACT_SWEEP_FSV. It will change the view on the instrument itself.

Requires a CONNECTION_FSV node at the start of the app to connect with
the instrument. The VISA address will then be listed under 'connection'.

This node should also work with compatible R&S network analyzers.
docstring.short_description: The Y_AXIS_SETTINGS_FSV node sets the y axis range.

parameters.name: connection
parameters.description: The VISA address (requires the CONNECTION_FSV node).

parameters.name: ref_level
parameters.description: The reference level (top of the y axis), in dBm.

parameters.name: spacing_type
parameters.description: The type of spacing for the y axis (bottom = ref - spacing).

parameters.name: spacing
parameters.description: Spacing for the y axis (bottom = ref - spacing), in dB or %.

videos.title: Read FM Radio Signals using Flojoy
